abstract: An object representing metrics about the use of location-tracking features of a device.

# MXLocationActivityMetric

**Class**

An object representing metrics about the use of location-tracking features of a device.

## Declaration

```swift
class MXLocationActivityMetric
```

## Reading location services use

- **cumulativeBestAccuracyForNavigationTime**: The total time spent tracking the current location at the best accuracy for navigation.
- **cumulativeBestAccuracyTime**: The total time spent tracking the current location at the best accuracy.
- **cumulativeNearestTenMetersAccuracyTime**: The total time spent tracking the current location to an accuracy of 10 meters.
- **cumulativeHundredMetersAccuracyTime**: The total time spent tracking the current location to an accuracy of 100 meters.
- **cumulativeKilometerAccuracyTime**: The total time spent tracking the current location to an accuracy of 1 kilometer.
- **cumulativeThreeKilometersAccuracyTime**: The total time spent tracking the current location to an accuracy of 3 kilometers.

## Battery metrics

- **MXCellularConditionMetric**: An object representing metrics about the condition of the cellular network.
- **MXCPUMetric**: An object representing metrics about the use of the CPU.
- **MXDisplayMetric**: An object representing metrics about the power used to display the app on the screen.
- **MXGPUMetric**: An object representing metrics about the use of the GPU.
- **MXNetworkTransferMetric**: An object representing metrics about network transfers.
- **MXCPUExceptionDiagnostic**: An object representing a diagnostic report for a fatal or nonfatal CPU exception.

## Inherits From

- MXMetric

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
